column4: I want to setup a server. File/Media possibly even a website. Would ubuntu server work well? Would it be better to start off with say XCFE or just stick with CLI.
I find having the GUI helpful at times, if you have the space for it
you could have the OS not load the gdm, but if your going to do that, then just dont install it
you can always setup the gdm/kdm later, if you miss the GUI
